snippet: A Spanish court absolved the defendants in the sinking of a tanker that led to one of Europe’s worst oil spills and devastated Spain’s northwestern coastline.
lead_paragraph: A Spanish court absolved the defendants in the sinking of a tanker that led to one of Europe’s worst oil spills and devastated Spain’s northwestern coastline.

headline.main: Court Finds Nobody Criminally Responsible for 2002 Oil Spill
headline.print_headline: Court Finds Nobody Criminally Responsible for 2002 Oil Spill
